# Flowchart {.unnumbered}
## Admin {-}

```{mermaid}
flowchart TD

A[Request Type] --> B[Existing Institution] 

  B --> M[Request: User Institutional Profile link provided?]
  M -- Yes --> G{View User Institutional Profile - Eligible? } -- No --> J[\Send Email 'To Process Request'/]
 

  G -- Yes --> TT[\Send email confirm correct AOR/] --> Q[\Log in Airtable Person/]
  M -- No --> J[\Send Email 'To Process Request'/]
 
A --> C[New Institution] 
  C --> I{View Institution Profile - Eligible?} -- Yes --> R{Was instiutitonal AOR provided?} -- Yes --> T[\Send email confirm correct AOR/] --> QQ[\Log in Airtable Person/]
  
  R -- No --> S[\Send email find AOR/] --> QQQ[\Log in Airtable Person/] --> V(Receive AOR information and permission to contact) --> U[\Send Email and AdobeSign to AOR and User/] --> W(AOR contact with Databrary) --> U
  W --> X[Legal Review Requested]
    X --> Y[\Send Email Amendment Pushback - Request Standard Agreement/] -- reject --> Z[\Send email to Mark Explaning issue/]
    Y -- accept as is --> A1(EMAIL AOR + Investigator every 3 weeks or so until signed agreement is returned)
  
  X --  
    
  
  I -- No --> K[\Send Email 'Institution Ineligible for access'/]
  
 
A --> D[Authorized Investigator] --> L[No Email Action Required] --> P(Log Authorization Activities Spreadsheet)
 
A --> E[No Request] --> F[\Send Email 'To Initiate Authorization'/] --> P(Log Authorization Activities Spreadsheet)

```
